word: 20 (Leviticus 23:10, 11). Christ the Antitypical Wave-Sheaf.--It was to the glory of God that the Prince of life should be the first fruits, the antitype of the typical wavesheaf. "For whom he did foreknow, he also did predestinate to be conformed to the image of his Son, that he might be the firstborn among many brethren." . . .
